title: DiRT 2 Patch 1.1 with RELOADED crack
description:
The DiRT 2 1.1 patch is meant to improve performance on NVidia GPU based systems, the full list of changes is listed below.  The 1.1 patch was released March 2010.

Also included is the RELOADED crack for this patch - as usual unzip and copy these files to your install directory once you have run the patch.

Tested and working on Vista 64 SP2.


-----DiRT2 Patch Change Notes----- 

Bug Fixes

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Added missing function key icons 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed several lighting artefacts in night races 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed missing initial load screen on multi-GPU setups under DX11 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Alt+Tab and Alt+Enter are now better supported under DX11 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Benchmark mode now correctly applies custom settings 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed missing text in benchmark mode pause menu 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed a crash when changing multisampling mode

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improved image sharpness in DX9

Audio 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed an issue where replay music would suddenly cut in when navigating a replay at very slow speeds 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Ensured that OpenAL is properly shut down when exiting the game using Alt+F4

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Added support for MS Sidewinder Force-Feedback USB Wheel
